body.name: Dresser for Bedroom with 6 Drawer, Wood Dressers & chests of Drawers with Gold Knobs, Modern Storage Drawers for entryway, Closet, Hallway (1, White)
features: 【High-Quality Materials】This dresser for bedroom is made of P2-grade thick premium particle board wooden frame, scratch-resistant and water-resistant, easy maintenance and clean. Vrullu white dresser have undergone multiple tests of strict selection and load-bearing, so you can rest assured that you will have years of use.

【Larger Storage Drawers Dresser】The long dresser for bedroom has 6 widened and enlarged drawers provide spacious storage space for your daily storage. You can also buy two wood modern dresser to form a 12-drawer dresser, Used to storage organizing clothes, blankets, scarves, socks, and other accessories.

【Multifunctional Dresser】Size at 47.2"L x 15.8"W x 30.7"H. The dressers bedroom furniture provides solid stability for ample load bearing and spacious storage space. The white chest of drawers can be used as a perfect wood storage chest for your bedroom, entryway, closet, hallway or as a TV stand(suit for 50"TV) for the living room. Also you can use it as nursery dresser.

【Modern Design】The white dresser for girls bedroom with black knobs and legs improve more modern style to your room. Anti dumping device on the back of the 6 drawer dresser to ensure the safety of kids or pets. A waterproof desktop will perfectly for you to display your favorite decorations and collectibles.

【Assembly with Clear Instruction & customer Support】We are equipped with accurate installation instructions for this modern dresser assembly. It is recommended that two people install white 6 drawer dresser together. If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us, we will reply to you within 24 hours and we won't let our customers suffer any loss.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A sleek, streamlined dresser with a great price!
reviews.reviewText: When I opened the package, I was initially intimidated because of the sheer number of parts inside it. After organizing everything, from top to bottom as shown in the photo, my wife and two kids were able to assemble it in 3 hours without using any power tools.The manual is very straightforward. All the diagrams are accurate. The surface of the dresser and all the drawers included are smooth and well made. The drawer knobs and the hairpin legs are made of metal with a gold finish which added a touch of sophistication to the dresser.I initially purchased this for my daughters room but I it was very beautiful that my wife placed it instead in her walk-in closet. The dresser is sturdy and looks so much better than the usual Ikea or Walmart DIY dressers. The item is also packaged well and that there are no scratches or any damage on the exterior and interior parts of the whole dresser.My wife is very happy with this purchase and instantly elevated her basic wire shelving closet into something that looks custom made for a fraction of the price. She now has a place to organize her socks, underwear and folded clothes in one beautiful dresser that also provided a stylish accent to her closet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Storage Solution for a Stylish and Spacious Bedroom - 5 Stars!
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the larger storage dresser for my bedroom, and I must say, it has exceeded my expectations in every way. This dresser not only provides ample storage space but also adds a touch of modern elegance to my room. I am truly impressed with its quality and functionality, making it worthy of a feature in my new home.First and foremost, the six drawers offer a generous amount of space for all my storage needs, not too big not too small. I have easily organized my clothes, blankets, scarves, socks, and various accessories without any hassle.The high-quality materials used in the construction of this dresser are noticeable the moment you lay your eyes on it. Maintaining and cleaning this dresser is a breeze, making it a practical choice for everyday use. The modern design of this dresser is a real showstopper. The white finish with gold knobs adds a dash of sophistication and mid-century modern style to my room. Additionally, the waterproof desktop is a thoughtful feature that allows me to display my favorite decorations and collectibles without worry.One thing I truly appreciate about this dresser is its versatility. Its solid stability and ample load-bearing capacity make it suitable for various purposes. Whether used as a bedroom storage chest, an entryway organizer, a hallway accent piece, or even a TV stand for the living room, this dresser fits seamlessly into any space. It can even be utilized as a nursery dresser, proving its adaptability to different needs.The assembly process was not too bad, thanks to the clear and accurate installation instructions provided. Although it is recommended to have two people for assembly, you may be able to do it on your own. Should you encounter any difficulties, the customer support provided is exceptional. They are prompt in responding to inquiries, ensuring that no customer suffers any loss.In conclusion, the larger storage dresser has been a fantastic addition to my bedroom. Its spacious storage, high-quality materials, stylish design, and multifunctional versatility make it a standout choice. I highly recommend this dresser to anyone in search of a reliable and aesthetically pleasing storage solution. I would recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this thinking it was going to be an easy build and I was totally wrong. It doesn’t come with all the items to build it 😭 and not every hole fits the screw in. I also waited to long and now I can’t get a refund! It looks beautiful but is not worth it. I honestly won’t be buying any furniture from Amazon.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Some improvements could be made
reviews.reviewText: The material can be easily scratched. And the two bottom drawers seem to stick out a little bit .But its not hard to put together and the instructions are very clear.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looks stunning. Well made. Would buy more from this maker.
reviews.reviewText: My 16-year-old daughter's first reaction on seeing the picture was "Oh, that's so pretty." (see picture in her room). I personally think it has a sleek and modern appearance. The package arrived undamaged (a first for such a large package) and the components inside were well packaged (see picture).My daughter helped me put it together. It took about 75 minutes. We used a power screwdriver which definitely helped. The instructions were easy to follow. All the hardware comes in individual labeled packages (see red plastic in the picture).The engineering is well-done. The edges fit together with tight tolerances. The drawers are level and evenly spaced (not found in most other DIY furniture). This compares well with that major Swedish store furniture well-known for its DIY kits. The solid stability and ample load-bearing capacity make it a reliable and versatile furniture piece. The drawers are spacious.A minor flaw is that we had to remove some gummy sticker residue from one of the drawer fronts.Recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good but very tight
reviews.reviewText: The dresser is beautiful but it is definitely not very spacious. The drawers are tiny, I wish they would go all the way to the back of the dresser as they end around 4 inches before the back. Drawers are 11 inch and the dresser's depth is 15 inches, so maybe it could have a better way of optimizing the space. If you have a lot of clothes you'd like to store, I would recommend buying a different one.the assembly took me around 3 hours and some of the parts were very difficult to assemble and they didn't quite fit well with each other. The holes are marked but they're not puctured and you have to do so while assembling.Good thing is that it fits great into my closet so it is helpful and a good addition but would probably not buy again.
